page.title: Head Hunter T Files
page.t: Receive notifications for NPCs claiming Wanted bounties.
Enables notifications when player AI ships spot a wanted ship.
Receive notifications for NPCs claiming Wanted bounties.
Enables verbal notifications when wanted bounties are claimed
Show Wanted tags on the map for player ships
Bounty hunters may occasionally hunt you
Only allow classic baddies on the wanted board (Xenon/Khaak/Pirates)
Allows boarding and capturing of Head Hunter ships
Affects non-Wanted bounties only. 1.0x is mod default
When enabling No Wanted Factions you should also click the Reset Wanted Board button
%s has paid a general bounty for the destruction of their enemy %s %s in the amount of %,s credits
Bounty Claim\n%s was destroyed in %s by %s\nBounty value: %s credits
%s was destroyed in %s by %s\nBounty value: %s credits\n%s thanks you for your efforts
%s %s was destroyed in %s by %s\nBounty value: %s credits
HEAD CLAIMED! %s was destroyed in %s by %s\nBounty value: %s credits
